Package org.somox.analyzer.simplemodelanalyzer.builder

Class AssemblyConnectorsInsideCompositeComponentStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.somox.analyzer.simplemodelanalyzer.builder.AssemblyConnectorsInsideCompositeComponentStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssemblyConnectorStrategy
    public class AssemblyConnectorsInsideCompositeComponentStrategy
extends Object
implements IAssemblyConnectorStrategy
    Strategy: Prefer establishing assembly connectors INSIDE a composite component instead of delegating to required ports.
    Establish assembly connector for remaining non-connected ports. These are connectors which cannot be enabled along with the clustering graph structure.
